kycRequired.title: Warning
kycRequired.message:
Dear users,

You can purchase Clean Sat Mining tokens after completing the following two steps:
1) In accordance with legal requirements, all users must first complete the KYC process on the Mt Pelerin platform before making purchases within our application. We therefore invite you to register on Mt Pelerin and complete your KYC.

2) Please note that CSM tokens are subject to a whitelist of approved addresses for interactions. Any transaction of these tokens to an unauthorized address will fail. We invite you to contact the CleanSat Mining support team and provide us with the Metamask or Wallet Connect 2 public address you wish to whitelist. If you are using multiple wallets, you can send us multiple addresses to whitelist.

We thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

The CleanSat Mining Team

usersNotFound.title: Error
usersNotFound.message: {{ usersNotFound }} users couldn't be retrieved. Check your RPC or refresh the table.

createOfferInvalid.title: Error
createOfferInvalid.message: You can not create this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is whitelisted and not in locking periode, you have the offer token in your wallet.

buyOfferInvalid.title: Error
buyOfferInvalid.message: You can not buy this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is not in locking periode, you have enough buyer token balance in your wallet to pay the offer.
